caption.p: Representation of the different anti-CMV antivirals currently in use as well as letermovir, benzimidazole structure (BDCRB and TCRB), and the sulfonamide BAY 38-4766.
Abbreviations: CMV, cytomegalovirus; TCRB, 2,5,6-trichloro-1-β-D-ribofuranosyl benzimidazole; BDCRB, 2-bromo-5,6-dichloro-1-(β-D-ribofuranosyl)benzimidazole.
